subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan had 24 points and 12 rebounds, and the San Antonio Spurs halted the visiting Milwaukee Bucks’ three-game winning streak with a 112-98 victory Monday night.
snippet: Tim Duncan had 24 points and 12 rebounds, and the San Antonio Spurs halted the visiting Milwaukee Bucks’ three-game winning streak with a 112-98 victory Monday night.
